name: Infinite Jonathans
description:
See Jonathan thrive… or ruin this man’s life. You decide.

Vote with players around the world to decide the outcome of Jonathan’s life!

Players experience every possible occurrence of Jonathan in the universe by voting on his life choices... from baby to RIP.

Is Jonathan a sensitive soul, or a mega-villain? Super-broke or making big bank? 

How you vote will greatly impact an unknowing Jonathan’s precious life.

Darkly comedic events, and absurd choices -- great to play with a group / stream.
